content:
User: Your Feedback: The debugging code clutter in the Gemini transcript is a key inefficiency. We’ll summarize it (keep first/last blocks, ditch the middle) to focus on collaboration patterns. JSON prompts, though, are gold—those stay intact as they’re critical for AI-AI communication.

Grok: Grok’s Input: The DeepSearch API integration (80K-100K chunks, message boundary respect) fits perfectly with our chunking logic. We’ll plug it in with minimal rework.
